note:
I am a software engineer and product architect in the MES / Pharmaceutical market.

I'm tremendously interested in books of all varieties, ranging from non-fiction, history, and biographies all of the way through YA dystopian fiction. If it's written, I'll probably enjoy it. I'm also in love with art, although most abstract art eludes me.

I'm also interested in advancing democracy, and in improving the lives of everyone, not just those lucky enough to be born wealthy or to fall into wealth.
